thread.title: Very Good Hotel at Herald Square
thread.title_full: Very Good Hotel at Herald Square - Review of Hilton Garden Inn New York/West 35th Street, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Tapper335
title: Very Good Hotel at Herald Square
text: This is our third stay at this hotel. It is very well located at Herald Square (Macy's) with easy access to Broadway/Times Square. 5th Avenue Mid-town and easy access to many subway lines at Herald Square and Penn Station. We drive in using the Lincoln Tunnel which makes this hotel very easy to reach going across 36th and then back on 35th Streets.
